content:
# The error indicates that I am still too far away from the target position (-14.5, -14.5) to place the Stone Furnace, despite my attempts to move closer.
# It seems I need to move to a position that is within the allowable range to place the furnace.

# To resolve this, I will move to a position that is closer to the stone resource patch. 
# I will choose coordinates that are within the 10-tile limit, such as (-10, -10).

move_to(Position(x=-10, y=-10))  # Moving to a closer position to facilitate placing the furnace.
